title: Codewars Readme Stats
description: Display your Codewars Stats at your GitHub Readme profile!
description:en-US: Display your Codewars stats at your GitHub Readme profile!
description:pt-BR: Exiba no seu perfil Readme do GitHub as Estatísticas do Codewars!

querys.name: top_languages
querys.description: Extens the card with 3 icons of the top trained languages.
querys.description:en-US: Extens the card with 3 icons of the top trained languages.
querys.description:pt-BR: Amplia o cartão com 3 ícones dos principais idiomas treinados.

querys.name: stroke
querys.description: Sets a border with the passed in color around the card.
querys.description:en-US: Sets a border with the passed in color around the card.
querys.description:pt-BR: Define a cor da borda ao redor do cartão.

querys.name: theme
querys.description: Sets a theme for the card.
querys.description:en-US: Sets a theme for the card.

querys.name: hide_clan
querys.description: Removes the clan name from the card.
querys.description:en-US: Removes the clan name from the card.
querys.description:pt-BR: Remove do cartão o nome do clã.

querys.name: cache-control
querys.description: Changes the cache-control http header value.
querys.description:en-US: Changes the cache-control http header value.
querys.description:pt-BR: Altera o valor do cabeçalho http do cache-control.

querys.name: animation
querys.description: Can be used to disable the animations.
querys.description:en-US: Can be used to disable the animations.
querys.description:pt-BR: Pode ser usado para desabilitar as animações.

examples.description: Theme light, stroke and cache control
examples.description:en-US: Theme light, stroke and cache control
examples.description:pt-BR: Tema claro com borda e controle de cache

examples.description: Card with top language, stroke and theme
examples.description:en-US: Card with top language, stroke and theme
examples.description:pt-BR: Cartão com linguagens, borda e tema
